function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased network security challenges with the expansion of 6g technology and connectivity scope","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strong and statistically significant correlation between prevalence of obesity and covid-19 mortality rate","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of previous technical studies on confined households and dwellings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cross-border collaboration leading to uncoordinated efforts in disease control.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Covid-19 symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative data extraction involving multiple investigators may lead to variations in data interpretation and extraction.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate mechanical ventilation systems may fail to regulate good indoor air quality and control infection transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temperature and covid-19 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of unprocessed biomass for cooking","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global recession due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote work","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through physical contact during the survey data collection process.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Structural issues exacerbating health and safety risks in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited air sampling volume and dilution of airborne sars-cov-2 in the room","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction of public services and limited opportunities for socializing can lead to an increase in stress, anxiety, and mental health issues.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misconception about the novelty of contagious diseases in urban settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on real estate markets","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improperly configured, maintained, or cleaned regulations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in hvac use due to differences in setpoints adjusted by homeowners","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social interactions in green spaces and rooftop amenities may lead to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection and monitoring of swimming pool facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demolition waste in landfills creating favorable breeding conditions for mosquitoes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hesitation that the execution of the european green deal egd may assumption between policy deployments and infection growth rates may not hold in real-world contexts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proper disposal of used disinfectants risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate containment space and functionality in residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of information involves interacting with building staff and users, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient air purification leading to high pm2.5 concentrations in various hospital areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skepticism surrounding the validity and transparency of existing donation
